Class AbstractSASLBindRequest<R extends SASLBindRequest<R>>

java.lang.Object
  org.opends.sdk.requests.AbstractBindRequest<R>
      org.opends.sdk.sasl.SASLBindRequest<R>
          org.opends.sdk.sasl.AbstractSASLBindRequest<R>
Type Parameters:
R - The type of SASL bind request.
All Implemented Interfaces:
CallbackHandler, BindRequest, Request, SASLContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnonymousSASLBindRequest, CRAMMD5SASLBindRequest, DigestMD5SASLBindRequest, ExternalSASLBindRequest, GSSAPISASLBindRequest, PlainSASLBindRequest
public abstract class AbstractSASLBindRequest<R extends SASLBindRequest<R>>
extends SASLBindRequest<R>
implements SASLContext, CallbackHandler

Abstract SASL bind request.
